creator: mbp@back-bone.dk
text:
I load the attached excel file
I put some data in the some cells, but never the ones defined as dropdowns.
I write the workbook to a new file

The output excel file doesn't have any dropdowns.

This is a different behaviour from the earlier POI version I was using (2.0).

My problem resembles 29065, and judging from 10214 I can't work around the problem programmatically. :-(

Re-tested OK in 3.1-beta1.

I assume this spreadsheet has 4 'data validation' drop-downs.  I could reproduce this problem in 3.0.2 (4 drop-downs go missing).

This is probably the same as bug 44510 which was fixed in svn r633151.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44510 ***
creator: josh@apache.org
